quotes.quote: Noblest of all dogs is the hot-dog; it feeds the hand that bites it.
If I'm out of town and I'm in a situation where I have to be creative, it has to be hot dogs because that's my comfort food.
A hot dog at the game beats roast beef at the Ritz.
No man can hope to be elected in his state without being photographed eating a hot dog at Nathan's Famous.
If you're the only hot dog stand in town, your hot dogs don't have to be good.
A hot dog with an interesting person is an amazing meal.
I basically love anything that comes in a hot dog bun... except hot dogs.

The use of an iconic food in an act of violence against an iconic golfer like Tiger Woods is reprehensible -- and a violation of hot dog etiquette. Some might call the thrower a 'wiener,' but we'd say that's too high a compliment. Hot dogs are meant to be enjoyed -- not weaponized.
They say hot dogs can kill you. How do you know it's not the bun?
My favorite meat is hot dog, by the way. That is my favorite meat.
Is the chemical aftertaste the reason why people eat hot dogs, or is it some kind of bonus?
In my house, a hot dog is a dog that's really hot.
I don't think there's anything wrong with a hot dog or other convenience foods, as long as they're balanced with fresh vegetables. It's hard to ignore 95 percent of the grocery store.
You know what I love best about baseball? The pine tar, the resin, the grass, the dirt - and that's just in the hot-dogs.
Some people wanted champagne and caviar when they should have had beer and hot dogs.
Barbecue is to North Carolina as the hot dog is to New York.
I'd rather get a hot dog or a doughnut than write a song.
Our brain, our body, craves fat. We cannot help it. That's why a kid will eat a hot dog quicker than a piece of broccoli.
When your kids LOVE sushi and hotdogs, you get creative.
If any of the socialist chiefs had tried to earn his living by selling hot dogs, he would have learned something about the sovereignty of the consumers.
If you have the right to call me a hot dog why do I not have the right to call you a stale 3-day old hamburger?
People have been manipulating food ever since they realized cooking a whole animal was difficult. Cows don't come in hot dog form.
